headline: Is Republic Services Inc. (RSG) The Best Boring Stock to Buy?
summary: We recently published a list of 7 Best Boring Stocks to Buy. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Republic Services Inc. (NYSE:RSG) stands against other best boring stocks to buy. “Boring” stocks, as the name suggests, are not the stocks that grab headlines like fast-growing tech stocks or high-risk […]
